name: SET_STATE
desc: state 1 is playing, 0 is disabled, may add more

name: SET_RESPAWN
desc: sets respawn time (displacement from current time in ms)

name: ADD_ENEMY
desc: adds an enemy team for this player (can be hit by them)

name: TRY_FIRE
desc: Sent when the player pulls the trigger

name: FIRE_SUCCESS
desc: Sent telling android whether the gun fired or not

name: TRY_RELOAD
desc: Sent when the player pulls the reload trigger

name: RELOAD_SUCCESS
desc: Sent telling android whether the gun finished reloading

name: SET_AMMO
desc: Sets the current ammo of the current gun

name: NO_LIVES
desc: Sent when the player runs out of lives

name: HIT_BY
desc: Specifies who hit us and with what

name: KILLED_BY
desc: Specifies who killed us and with what

name: SET_START_TIME
desc: Sets the game start time as a displacement (ms) from the current time

name: SET_END_TIME
desc: Sets the game end time as a displacement (ms) from the current time

name: FLUSH
desc: sending this at any point will refresh the serial buffer
